profile.title: Developer Profile
profile.body: Fullstack developer skilled in React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Experienced in building and deploying personal and academic projects with clean, responsive UI. Passionate about modern web applications and collaborative development.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
items: Frontend: React, CSS Modules, Responsive Design, Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB (Mongoose), JWT Authentication, REST APIs, Zod (validation)
Security & Middleware: Helmet, CORS, bcrypt, input sanitization
Tooling: Git, ESLint (Airbnb), TypeScript ESLint, Prettier, tsx

postgrad.degree: Postgraduate in Analysis and Development of Systems - PUC, 2025
postgrad.focus: Focus: Web Standards, UX, Frontend (React), Backend (Node.js), Agile Methodologies

bachelor.degree: Bachelor of Law - Faculdade de Direito de Franca, 2012
bachelor.focus: Focus: Legal reasoning, compliance awareness, structured problem-solving
